title: VR-Based Experiential Science Inquiry Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Experimental Methodologies
context.additional_context: Systematic experience of real scientific problem-solving processes in a virtual laboratory environment using VR equipment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce real-world scientific field problems with over 80% fidelity through VR simulation.
Learners can analyze their problem-solving processes in three or more stages by writing a structured reflective journal after experiential activities.
Learners can perform three or more meaningful interactions while solving complex scientific problems through collaborative simulation with peers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
